name: 2018/10/19 Lunch Pancit
description: This '2018/10/19 Lunch Pancit' recipe is tailored for those looking for a high-protein, healthy meal option without compromising on taste. Perfectly blending the nutritious goodness of okra, cabbage, carrots, and chicken with the delightful flavors of instant vegetable noodles, coconut amino, and a splash of calamansi, this dish is a healthified twist on the classic Pancit. Whether you're aiming to maintain a balanced diet or simply in search of a deliciously healthy recipe, this dish promises to satisfy your cravings while nourishing your body.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the okra, cabbage, and carrots under cold water. Slice the okra, shred the cabbage, and julienne the carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the instant vegetable noodles according to package instructions until tender, then drain and set aside. (Cook time: PT10M)
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, cook the chicken pieces until no longer pink and fully cooked through. (Cook time: PT10M)
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the prepared okra, cabbage, and carrots to the pan with the chicken. Stir well and cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp. (Cook time: PT5M)
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the cooked instant noodles with the vegetable and chicken mixture. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the calamansi over the pancit and add the coconut amino. Stir well to ensure everything is evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
